attributes.review: I downloaded the app and while it was loading I went outside for a walk (keep in mind it is a very sunny day out) I start to walk when I come across a Trump 2020 flyer, I thought it was just a coincidence, but boy was I wrong. As I continued my journey more and more trump 2020 flyers came up until suddenly I looked down at my phone and there was an image of the exact same flyer that popped up in the app, I begin to get paranoid so I started walking home but as soon as I got back to my neighborhood it got really dark and started thundering. Then every time I would go on the app it would start blinking red until I couldnâ€™t get out of the app anymore I tried to throw my phone into a river, but there were so many flyers that said trump 2020 on them flying around they just whisked my phone back into my hands. Then a large van that said trump 2020 on the side popped up. Two men got out of the back and grabbed me and knocked me out, when I came to, I was in the back of the van where they had computers that had everyone who downloaded the apps name and location! Then I realized in the back of everyoneâ€™s head was a Cut and inside was a chip, the app was controlling them! They held my head down on a table and try to cut open my skull to implant a chip but I kicked them in the shin and kicked the doors open and jumped out, as they chased after me I jumped into the river, the Trump 2020 flyers tried to whisk me back up but I just kept knocking them out of the way, I swam for about three hours until I finally came to a house along the river where other refugees from the Trump 2020 app weâ€™re staying, Iâ€™m still there now, let me know if any of you need to know the location to get away from this horrible app. âš ï¸NO TRUMP APPS OR FLYERS ALLOWEDâš ï¸
